pages.text: $(li)The Dimension Compass is an alternative of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/compass)Compass$(/l).$(br)$(li)It always points to the exit of the dimension.
$(li)For example, in the Nether dimension, the Dimension Compass will be always pointing to the $(l:patchouli:perks/nether_portal)Nether Portal$(/l).
